issue.title: [R] Minor docs updates
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12520](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12520). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- spelling:
-  I think that the words "will is under" in this section might be a typo:
  Special instructions on Linux: You will need to set LD_LIBRARY_PATH to the lib directory that will is under where we set $ARROW_HOME, before launching R and using Arrow.
- The section titled "Troublshooting" is missing an "e" in the title

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12520?focusedCommentId=17332696) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10143
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10143>
